title: Can’t Move
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>No, no way! Zhong Lanzhu, hang in there! You can do this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Give it up, Lanzhu-san......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu won’t lose to you, Hanamaru! Stop resisting, Hanamaru!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru isn’t going to lose either, zura......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>HANAMARU!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>No human being can resist the kotatsu......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Not even Lanzhu......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Hey Lanzhu-san, look, there are mikans.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>The sweet and sour juice would warm up my body...... Okay, Lanzhu surrenders.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>There are also rice crackers~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
